controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminController

  • public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    AdminController is the class for controlling the Admin Page. The respective view is admin.fxml This class is used for creating and deleting users
    Author:
    Chris LoPresti, Kyle Myers

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkDupe(java.lang.String n)
      This method checks to make sure that when an admin tries to create a new user, that the new username doesn't already exist
      void clearNew()
      This method clears the admins create new user text fields clears username textfield clears name textfield clears password textfield
      void clearSearch()
      This method clears the admins search textfield
      void createUser()
      Allows the admin to create users, duplicate users are not allowed A user is concidered to be a duplicate if they share the same username as another user
      void deleteUser()
      Allows the admin to delete users
      void initialize(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userNameList, java.util.List<java.lang.String> nameList, java.util.List<java.lang.String> passList)
      Attempts to load a previous saved list of users from a text file.
      void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This will log the admin out and take them to the login page
      static void recursiveDelete(java.io.File file)
      This recursively deletes all directories that are associated with a user once the user is deleted
      void search()
      Allows the admin to search for a user by their username
      void writeFile()
      This method writes the list of users to a text file

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userNameList,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> nameList,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> passList)
        Attempts to load a previous saved list of users from a text file. If successful it will populate a ListvIEW with users and attach a listener to the ListView
        Parameters:
        mainStage - The main stage

      • createUser

        public void createUser()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Allows the admin to create users, duplicate users are not allowed A user is concidered to be a duplicate if they share the same username as another user
        Parameters:
        event - The Create User button is pressed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for serializing a new user

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Allows the admin to delete users
        Parameters:
        event - The Delete User button is pressed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for writing the list of users to a text file

      • recursiveDelete

        public static void recursiveDelete(java.io.File file)
        This recursively deletes all directories that are associated with a user once the user is deleted
